description.title: DDoS
texts: Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) is a type of DOS attack where multiple systems, which are trojan infected, target a particular system which causes a DoS attack.
A DDoS attack uses multiple servers and Internet connections to flood the targeted resource.
This means that the hackers have attacked your website or PC by imposing heavy traffic. Thus, crashing the website or computer due to overloading.
